sentences.en: A good novel serves to educate and inspire people.
sentences.cn: 一本好的小说足以教育人民和鼓舞人民.

sentences.en: a range of designs inspired by wild flowers
sentences.cn: 从野花中得到灵感的一系列设计

sentences.en: Although her popular image was contrived It'served to inspire music and pageantry.
sentences.cn: 尽管她的大众形象是精心打造的,但是可用以给音乐会和大型表演增添气氛.

sentences.en: He has neither the policies nor the personal charisma to inspire people.
sentences.cn: 他既无谋略又无个人魅力来鼓舞人。

sentences.en: I would inspire you with repentance and not drive you to desperation.
sentences.cn: 我是想叫你听了翻然悔改,而不是要把你赶到绝路上去.

sentences.en: If I do, it might inspire other Iranian women, she says.
sentences.cn: 如果我成功了, 这也许会激励其它伊朗妇女.

sentences.en: Inspired by the sunny weather, I decided to explore the woods.
sentences.cn: 阳光明媚的天气令人振奋，我决定到森林里寻幽探胜。

sentences.en: Our challenge is to motivate those voters and inspire them to join our cause.
sentences.cn: 我们面临的挑战是如何调动那些选民的积极性并鼓励他们加入我们的事业。

sentences.en: Perhaps the intense loyalty that these firms inspire is just an interesting idiosyncrasy.
sentences.cn: 也许这些公司所激发的强烈的忠诚感只是一种有趣的癖好.

sentences.en: The book was inspired by a real person, namely Tamara de Treaux.
sentences.cn: 这本书是受一个叫塔玛拉·德特罗的人启发而写成的。

sentences.en: The caves cannot but inspire wonder in the beholder.
sentences.cn: 这些洞穴让观者无不叹为观止。

sentences.en: The muse does not inspire all poets equally.
sentences.cn: 诗神并不一视同仁地赐给所有诗人灵感.

sentences.en: The record of his triumphant passage will inspire free hearts for all time.
sentences.cn: 他的胜利航程将永远鼓舞着自由的心灵.

sentences.en: The Sina acquisition is to inspire more non - traditional thinking.
sentences.cn: 新浪被收购带来更多 非传统 的思考.

sentences.en: The story was inspired by a chance meeting with an old Russian duke.
sentences.cn: 这个故事的创作灵感来自与一位俄国老公爵的不期而遇。

sentences.en: These are the people whom you hope to inspire with lofty ideals!
sentences.cn: 这些人就是你想用崇高的理想去激励鼓舞的人 啊 !

sentences.en: These herbs will inspire you to try out all sorts of exotic-flavoured dishes!
sentences.cn: 这些香草会激发你去品尝各种异国风味的菜肴！

sentences.en: They can inspire euphoria, but can also induce dependency.
sentences.cn: 它们能让人兴奋, 但也能导致依赖.

sentences.en: This will inspire them to further efforts to win economic independence.
sentences.cn: 这将鼓舞他们进一步努力去争取经济独立.

sentences.en: We need someone who can inspire the team.
sentences.cn: 我们需要一个能鼓舞团队士气的人。

words.tran_cn: 鼓舞人心的；灌输的；启发灵感的
鼓舞；激发；使感悟（inspire的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 激励，启发，赋予灵感，唤起(感情)，吸入（空气）
trans.tran_en: to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something
to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something
